Package schedulemanager.repository

Class TodayRepository

java.lang.Object
schedulemanager.repository.TodayRepository
public class TodayRepository extends Object
Repository for managing TodayTask mappings in the database.

TodayTask represents the selection of tasks for a specific day. This repository handles adding/removing tasks from the Today list and managing their display order.
